titleStmt.title: A new ballad; declaring The excellent parable of the prodigal child. To the tune of, The wanton wife.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright.,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)

Right half-sheet contains: The second part, shewing the great misery he endured, being constrained through hunger, to eat with the hogs, and how his merciful father received him again. To the same tune.
Reproduction of original in: University of Glasgow. Library.
